Description: PUT THE MUG IN COFFEEMACHINE AND SWITCH ON
CHECK THE UNWASHED PLATES AND BOWLS IN THE SINKBASIN .IF FOUND WASH THEM

TAKE OUT THE BREAD AND TOAST IN TOASTER
TAKE A PAN AND EGG.SWITCH ON THE STOVE KNOB
TAKE A TOMATO AND CRUSH IT TO MAKE SOUP IN POT
Take Lettuce make soup using stoveknob and then serve in bowl.
FILL THE POT WITH WATER FROM FAUCET AND BOIL ON THE STOVE
GO AND CHECK THE CRACKED EGG. IF IT FOUND THROW IT IN A BIN
TAKE ALL THAT ITEM IN FRIDGE
Make sure the potato is sliced properly and put it in some water then microwave it
Find a clean glass and properly uncork the wine and slowly pour into a glass
Take all the food outside, and put them into the fridge
Take a clean cup and go to a sink and turn the tap on and fill the cup
Find the potato in the room and put it into a pot for boiling
Take the slices and throw them into the bin
Find all the kitchen utensils like knife, butter knife, spatula and fork and try put them into drawers

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_16_10
Description: Find the cup of coffee and pour them into the sink.
Hold the pot and firmly and slowly dump it into the sink
Walk up to the kitchen light and just flick it off
Locate the laptop in the room. Pick up the laptop and carry it to the sofa. Open the laptop and power it on.
Walk to coffee table. Pick up remote. Walk to sofa. Face television. Point remote towards television. Press power button on remote. Sit on sofa. Observe the television.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_202_10
Description: Walk to television stand. Pick up watch. Look at watch. Observe time on the watch.
Firstly see the opened box. Take all the things that can fit into the box and put them into the box. Then close the box and pack it.
Firstly open the tissue box and see if there are tissues in it. If all the tissues are used then throw the tissue box into the bin.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_204_10

Description: Throw the phone as hard as you at the wall
Pick the hand phone from the glass table and make a call on it.
